title: Whistleblower describes 'chaos' of UK Afghan exit
content: Thousands of pleas for help went unread and the foreign secretary lacked urgency, an ex-official says.

title: Whistleblower describes 'chaos' of UK Afghan exit
content: Thousands of pleas for help went unread and the foreign secretary lacked urgency, an ex-official says.

title: Hate crime call for stirring up hostility over sex
content: But the Law Commission is criticised over its stance on misogyny in a wide-ranging report.

title: Drug targets for prisons in England and Wales
content: Under new plans, each jail will be given a target on the number of drug tests that must be carried out.

title: Omicron spreading in the community, Javid confirms
content: The new variant is spreading in multiple regions of England, the health secretary says.

title: Drugs plan aims to help 300,000 problem drug users
content: A new drugs strategy will mean more funding for treatment and a crackdown on gangs, ministers say.

title: Union loses legal challenge in Patel bullying case
content: Boris Johnson kept his home secretary in place, saying she had not broken ministerial rules.

title: Arthur Labinjo-Hughes review to begin next week
content: The investigation focuses on the six-year-old tortured and killed by his father and stepmother.
